casebody.data:
THE UNITED STATES, PETITIONER, v. JAMES M. HEARNE [No. 45105] [107 C. Cls. 335;

331 U. S. —]

Overtime pay; wages of Canal Zone employee, under section 23 of the Act of March 28,1934, employed on a monthly basis; opinion in Townsley case reaffirmed.

Defendant’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court June 23, 1947.
